name: Outer Outage
summary:
UH OH!! A little alien named Blemie got his ship stolen by the EVIL robot Retri whilst on vacation to the Planet Cluster! What will he do now!? Well he's gotta find the Outages, creatures that possess insane electrical energy and can take out the high tech security measures Retri has set up.

So now... jump, dash, drop and LAUNCH through all of Planet Cluster for these Outages! Game contains 13 whole open sandbox collectathon stages, 8 bossfights (3 mini bosses too) and fast paced, adrenaline pumping collectathon gameplay! All tied together with a vibrant, mixed media art style and a 2.5D, surreal aesthetic.
